I rather like the 64-bit version. As long a you have a 64-bit CPU you'll be fine. I do warn you that *some* software is a tad more difficult to install in 64-bit ubuntu than 32-bit. However I found installing wine (just for it's libarires) fixes most issues with 64-bit
